title: Simulation-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Course for Pre-Service Teachers: Strengthening TPACK Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematics teaching methodologies and experience integrating digital devices
context.additional_context: Immersive learning environment simulating real classrooms/VR for learners in managerial roles in corporate mathematics education, focusing on TPACK (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge) development.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the TPACK-based instructional design model to develop mathematics lesson design documents
Learners can develop math lesson scenarios through the stages of learner characteristics analysis → technology integration → interaction design in a simulation environment.
Learners can provide feedback on peers' math lesson designs using a VR-based assessment rubric.

resources: Digital content library for math education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
